name: Jingle Kart 64
description:
WASD/ ARROW KEYS

1 lap/ 1 map

Made for the Yogscast Jingle Jam 2022. There are lots of secrets and references to find.
Stuck in 4:3 aspect ratio intentionally, zoom in if needed.
